bugs.summary: Update to mots 0.10.0
name AudioCallbackDriver audio streams with document title
Ask user to install AV1 extension in the Codec Support Information section in `about:support`
Media capabilities table in about:support broken on at least Linux
Crash in [@ opensl_configure_capture]
:is(:host) doesn't work, but it probably should.
[css-color] Alpha values are not clamped when NAN
Radio inputs after checked input have indeterminate style on page load
Mark asan/tsan has-complexity test for timeout
has-sibling-insertion-removal.html wpt failures
Intermittent dom/animation/test/mozilla/test_restyles.html | single tracking bug
[popover] Refine popover focusing steps to follow the specs
Enable all ESLint rules on the rest of dom/**/*.xhtml files that were renamed from xul
Dynamically adding and removing disabled attribute on fieldset tag does not work as expected
Copy event is not fired when pressing CTRL+C on contenteditable without selection
CSP violation report can be made to leak cross origin information from embedded page (bypassing SOP)
Assertion failure: !js::IsCrossCompartmentWrapper(target), at /js/src/jsapi.cpp:514
Intermittent TEST-UNEXPECTED-TIMEOUT | dom/workers/test/test_WorkerDebugger.xhtml,test_WorkerDebugger.xhtml | application timed out after 370 seconds with no output
Intermittent dom/workers/test/test_sharedworker_event_listener_leaks.html | single tracking bug
Intermittent dom/workers/test/test_WorkerDebugger_frozen.xhtml | single tracking bug
Crash in [@ mozilla::dom::Notification::SetStoredState]
Assertion failure: actor, at /dom/workers/sharedworkers/SharedWorker.cpp:257
Remove ObjectBase::mValid
Correctly implement Pipeline::GetBindGroupLayout
Investigate lazy function name for getter and setter functions
Throw an error if setTimeZone is given an invalid time zone
Change ICU OOM behaviour to crash on OOM
Loongson64: change `MacroAssembler::storeUncanonicalized{Float32,Double} to return a `FaultingCodeOffset`.
Paint overlapping selections
Select color no longer affects dropdown arrow color.
Extra files in layout/reftests/table-bordercollapse/
More clean up in table code
Intermittent netwerk/test/unit/test_race_cache_with_network.js | single tracking bug
Implement interface to send data stop notification to stream listeners
Turn webtransport/echo-large-bidirectional-streams.https.html into any.js
neqo v0.6.6
Calling Clear() on SVG list types should set mAttrIsSet/mIsAttrSet/mIsBaseSet to false
CacheAPI PBM support: Enable mochitests to run on private and regular mode.
CacheAPI PBM support: Encrypt CacheAPI backed sqlite db
CacheAPI PBM support: Allow CacheAPI storage under a pref in PBM
CacheAPI PBM support: Clear private origins data at the session end
Create a marionette test to verify DOM CacheAPI private browsing implementation.
Enable CacheStorage::Constructor for Private Browsing mode.
WebRTC DataChannel unordered is not working if channel is negotiated
Firefox does not initially provide accessible API on launch.
Freeze at nsUserIdleService::GetIdleTime()
Custom formatter should be called with proxy object
Ignored sources warning in sources panel can be clipped
test browser_net_image_cache.js should wait for both requests to be completed
Add lint error for loading `resource:///` and `resource://app/` URLs from files in `toolkit/` (and really anywhere except `browser/`).
Test the real Suggest Rust component and desktop remote settings client by using a remote settings server
Update Firefox View tests to ensure tab items have fully rendered before continuing
Clean up translations about:preferences tests
Warning lines missing from build output
Rebuilding with `--target=x86_64-pc-windows-msvc` fails with "missing separator"
Add artifact build support to mozbuild for comm-release
Force cargo to run when Cargo.lock changes
Profiles are missing some markers (e.g. dumpsymbols for gtest libxul.so)
Remove direct dependencies to non root-nodes in the compile graph in root-deps.mk
MPRIS Bus Name not unique
HighFreq OS X 11 WebRender TypeError: <lambda>() missing 1 required positional argument: 'cached'
Replace "ViewportOptions" with "BoxOptions" for "browsingContext.captureScreenshot" command
TypeError: extraOptions is undefined [@getSharedIdForNode]
Investigate if tests of .popup-notification-primary-button click in Add-ons Manager need to be excluded from a11y_checks
Display "Manage Addresses" in autocomplete menu when a field was filled with address information
Nesting menupopups' first `menuitem` is misaligned with its originating `menu` by 1px
moz-support-link lives in toolkit but requires browser ftl file
Intermittent toolkit/components/extensions/test/mochitest/test_ext_contentscript_about_blank.html | single tracking bug
